room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by ROOM 5280 in Denver
room_description: An eccentric millionaire went out for a one hour walk. This is exactly how much time your team has to rob his house! You will find money, gold, silver, paintings, collectibles…but… there is a problem. The greedy man was so obsessed with his wealth he turned the house into a trap full of secrets, hidden places, puzzles, locks and other surprises! Only the smartest, the most creative and organized thieves can rob the house and escape within 60 minutes…
